title: How to Stream Data from DANDI
description: Guide on streaming data directly from the DANDI Archive into pynapple for real-time data analysis.

title: Using Wavelet Transforms to Analyze Signal Data
description: A tutorial on performing continuous wavelet transforms to capture changes in signal data over time using pynapple.

title: Filtering Signal Data with Pynapple
description: Learn how to apply various filters (bandpass, lowpass, highpass, bandstop) to analyze signal frequencies with pynapple.

title: Analyzing Calcium Imaging Data
description: Explore methods for working with calcium imaging data, including plotting activity and identifying head-direction cells.

title: NWB & Lazy-loading in Pynapple
description: Understand how to efficiently load and work with NWB files using pynapple's lazy-loading features.

title: Creating Tuning Curves from Neural Data
description: Step-by-step instructions on generating and analyzing tuning curves for different neural activity datasets.

title: Understanding TsGroup and Metadata Handling
description: Gain insights into organizing and manipulating groups of time series data with metadata using pynapple's TsGroup.

title: Performing Peri-Event Time Histogram (PETH) Analysis
description: How to align events with time series data to analyze the relationship between stimuli and neural activity.

title: High Performance Filtering Techniques
description: Compare Butterworth and Windowed-sinc filters for performance and precision, especially for large datasets.

title: Decoding Neural Activity for Behavioral Insights
description: Learn techniques for decoding neural activity to infer behavioral states or stimuli presence using pynapple.

title: Advanced Time Series Manipulation with Pynapple
description: Delve deeper into time series slicing, indexing, and arithmetic operations tailored for neuroscience data.

title: Using Pynapple for TsdFrame and TsdTensor Operations
description: Understand the different data structures available in pynapple for column-based and multi-dimensional data.

title: Applying Phase Coupling Analysis to Neural Spikes
description: Techniques to explore the relationship between neural spikes and oscillatory phase using filtering and Hilbert transforms.

title: Streaming and Analyzing Large Datasets Efficiently
description: Leveraging pynapple's capabilities for streaming data from large datasets without overwhelming memory usage.

title: Creating Continuous Spectral Density Estimates
description: Compute power spectral densities across different epochs for thorough analysis of signal characteristics.

title: Conducting Autocorrelogram and Crosscorrelogram Analysis
description: Guide on how to use pynapple to compute and interpret correlograms for assessing neuronal synchrony.

title: Efficiently Saving and Loading Pynapple Objects
description: Best practices for saving and restoring pynapple objects using NPZ and NWB formats.

title: Handling Memory Maps During Analysis
description: Effectively use numpy and zarr memory maps with pynapple for scalable data processing.

title: Wavelet Parametrization for Time-Frequency Analysis
description: Understand how wavelet parameters affect resolution and reconstruction fidelity in temporal analyses.

title: Extracting and Interpreting LFP Data from NWB Files
description: How to extract and analyze Local Field Potential data from NWB recordings using pynapple.
